snippet: An avid tennis fan from New York makes a whirlwind trip to Wimbledon just for the day....
abstract: Tennis fan Allison Creekmore says she took advantage of last minute ticket sales for Sunday match at Wimbledon, which was caused by rain delay; last time Wimbledon match was played on Sunday was in 2004.
lead_paragraph: An avid tennis fan from New York makes a whirlwind trip to Wimbledon just for the day.

headline.main: At Wimbledon, a Rare Sunday for Play Brings Out the Adventure in One Fan
headline.print_headline: From Fan  to Jet-Setter for a Day of Tennis
